text: The Hessischer Rundfunk (HR) is a German television and radio broadcasting company based in Frankfurt am Main in the State of Hesse. HR is a member of the group of German public-broadcasting institutions that makes up ARD. The HR produces the regional television service HR Fernsehen (which used to be called HR Fernsehen ) and six regional radio channels.
